goals__remit: Remedia is one of the major European WEEE and Batteries  PRO (Producers Responsibility Organization): it is a non for profit institution in charge of managing the end of life of electrical and electronic equipments (W-EEE) and batteries derived by the products put on the market by its associates that are more than 1500.
